Name: Fifty.ServerTeamBalance [FSTB]
Description:
Part of FSU [ Fifty Server Utilities ]
Implements helper functions used by other mods.

Dependencies:
  - Northstar

ConVars.Name: FSTB_TEAM_BALANCE_ENABLED
ConVars.HelpString: Whether the teams should be balanced at the start of a match. ( In reality its at the end, but fells like its at the begining )
